body:
So Lets chat about why everyone is leaving avicus. Because number 1 they have removed levels from every game. I was trying to hit prestige and i was level 49 and they took it away. The question ill be asking is WHY? 

Please Reply Avicus Moderators and Administrators why you took this away from all the people playing avicus. Page 859 of the forums proves most people left because of the level removal. Im very sad that this had to happen and i want to know why.

In the mornings you see about 60 people on. Afternoons gains about another 40-50

This would go MUCH MUCH higher if these levels were put back in place.

Kind Regards,

ShadowWalker X
body_tagged:

Please Reply Avicus Moderators and Administrators why you took this away from all the people playing avicus. Page 859 of the forums proves most people left because of the level removal. Im very sad that this had to happen and i want to know why.

In the mornings you see about 60 people on. Afternoons gains about another 40-50

This would go MUCH MUCH higher if these levels were put back in place.

Kind Regards,

ShadowWalker X
title: Why Everyone Is Leaving Avicus

replies.body:
Things change, it might not have been the removal of prestiges, it may have been personal reasons. The admins have Confirmed that prestiges will not be added back regardless.
Plus, even if we did add prestiges back, what has done is done. People may not want to join back regardless.

However, we are slowly increasing player count daily. Not all hope is lost. :)

replies.body: You can't just expect servers not to change or update purely because you want to sustain a consistently high player count. Sometimes the count drops, sometimes very low but even then Avicus' flame is still burning. See the servers progress as a fire: if you leave it unattended to it'll smoulder and die, yet on the other hand if you feed it it'll grow and roar with energy and sometimes it rains a bit and the fire dies down a bit but it continues to burn through thick and thin and that is just one aspect that makes Avicus exceptionally unique.
replies.body_tagged: You can't just expect servers not to change or update purely because you want to sustain a consistently high player count. Sometimes the count drops, sometimes very low but even then Avicus' flame is still burning. See the servers progress as a fire: if you leave it unattended to it'll smoulder and die, yet on the other hand if you feed it it'll grow and roar with energy and sometimes it rains a bit and the fire dies down a bit but it continues to burn through thick and thin and that is just one aspect that makes Avicus exceptionally unique.

replies.body:
Yes, it isn't that we aren't listening or don't understand that they aren't coming back, it's the fact that they SHOULD be back. They were the reason players actually stayed online and why we had a consistent minimum of 200-300 people. 
I don't want prestiges back to be whiny or get my way, but because it was very obviously a big part of keeping Avicus together and now it has been removed with imminent results.
Yesterday I saw 5 people online.. I wonder why..

replies.body:
They are both similar and different, but with the new system, you can earn an amount of credits for a badge that has different designs and colors. When prestige was around, you could earn a badge, but they would be different colors for each one you earned. Honestly, I like the new system better, because I can buy the badge I want and the color I want with the credits I earn :P.
Edit: There is also no need for change because, many people are already adapted to the new Avicus. If Avicus were constantly changing, then that is a key factor for players to leave the server. There is no need to loose more players, when the server is gaining more players already.
replies.body_tagged:
They are both similar and different, but with the new system, you can earn an amount of credits for a badge that has different designs and colors. When prestige was around, you could earn a badge, but they would be different colors for each one you earned. Honestly, I like the new system better, because I can buy the badge I want and the color I want with the credits I earn :P.
Edit: There is also no need for change because, many people are already adapted to the new Avicus. If Avicus were constantly changing, then that is a key factor for players to leave the server. There is no need to loose more players, when the server is gaining more players already.
